entry.name: Mothwing Cloak
entry.requirements: "Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul" | "Isma's Tear" | "Grubberfly's Elegy" | "Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak" | "Mantis Claw" | "Monarch Wings" | "Glowing Womb" | "Spore Shroom" | "Weaversong" | ("Mark of Pride" + HARD)

entry.name: Mantis Claw
entry.requirements: "Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak" | "Monarch Wings" | "Mantis Claw" | "Isma's Tear" | (("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul") + HARD) | ("Crystal Heart" + ("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul" | "Grubberfly's Elegy" | "Glowing Womb" | "Spore Shroom" | "Desolate Dive" | "Descending Dark" | "Weaversong"))

entry.name: Crystal Heart
entry.requirements: ("Mantis Claw" + ("Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak" | "Crystal Heart" | "Monarch Wings" | (("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul") + HARD))) | ("Monarch Wings" + ("Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak" | "Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul") + HARD + CLASSIC)

entry.name: Monarch Wings
entry.requirements: ("Monarch Wings" + HARD) | ("Mantis Claw" + ("Crystal Heart" | "Monarch Wings"))

entry.name: Shade Cloak
entry.requirements: ("Mantis Claw" + ("Monarch Wings" | (("Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak" | "Crystal Heart") + HARD))) | ("Mothwing Cloak" + "Shade Cloak" + "Monarch Wings" + HARD)

entry.name: Isma's Tear
entry.requirements: "Crystal Heart" + ("Mantis Claw" | ("Monarch Wings" + "Isma's Tear"))

entry.name: Dream Nail
entry.requirements: "Mantis Claw" | HARD

entry.name: Dream Gate
entry.requirements: KEYITEMS

entry.name: Awoken Dream Nail
entry.requirements: KEYITEMS

entry.name: Shade Soul
entry.requirements: (("Mantis Claw" | "Monarch Wings") + HARD + CLASSIC) | ("Mantis Claw" + ("Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak" | "Crystal Heart" | "Monarch Wings" | "Isma's Tear"))

entry.name: Desolate Dive
entry.requirements: (("Mantis Claw" | "Monarch Wings") + HARD + CLASSIC) | ("Mantis Claw" + ("Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak" | "Crystal Heart" | "Monarch Wings" | "Isma's Tear"))

entry.name: Descending Dark
entry.requirements: ("Desolate Dive" | "Descending Dark") + (("Mantis Claw" + ("Crystal Heart" | ((("Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak") + ("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul")) + HARD))) | ("Monarch Wings" + ("Crystal Heart" | "Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak" | (("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul") + HARD))))

entry.name: Howling Wraiths
entry.requirements: "Mantis Claw" | "Monarch Wings"

entry.name: Abyss Shriek
entry.requirements: ("Howling Wraiths" | "Abyss Shriek") + ((("Mantis Claw" | "Monarch Wings") + HARD) | ("Mantis Claw" + "Monarch Wings"))

entry.name: Grubsong
entry.requirements: KEYITEMS

entry.name: Baldur Shell
entry.requirements: ("Mantis Claw" | "Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak" | "Monarch Wings" | "Crystal Heart") + ("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul" | "Desolate Dive" | "Descending Dark" | "Grubberfly's Elegy" | "Glowing Womb" | "Spore Shroom" | "Weaversong" | ("Mark of Pride" + HARD))

entry.name: Fury of the Fallen
entry.requirements: "Mantis Claw"

entry.name: Quick Focus
entry.requirements: KEYITEMS

entry.name: Lifeblood Heart
entry.requirements: "Mantis Claw" | "Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak" | "Monarch Wings" | "Crystal Heart" | (("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul") + HARD) | (HARD + CLASSIC)

entry.name: Lifeblood Core
entry.requirements: KEYITEMS

entry.name: Defender's Crest
entry.requirements: ("Mantis Claw" + ("Crystal Heart" | "Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak" | "Monarch Wings" | HARD)) | ("Monarch Wings" + HARD)

entry.name: Flukenest
entry.requirements: ("Desolate Dive" | "Descending Dark") + ("Mantis Claw" | HARD)

entry.name: Thorns of Agony
entry.requirements: "Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak" | ("Mantis Claw" + "Crystal Heart")

entry.name: Mark of Pride
entry.requirements: "Mantis Claw" | ("Monarch Wings" + HARD)

entry.name: Steady Body
entry.requirements: "Mantis Claw" | "Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak" | "Monarch Wings" | "Crystal Heart" | (("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul") + HARD) | (HARD + CLASSIC)

entry.name: Heavy Blow
entry.requirements: "Mantis Claw" | ("Monarch Wings" + ("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul" | "Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak") + HARD)

entry.name: Sharp Shadow
entry.requirements: "Mothwing Cloak" + "Shade Cloak" + ("Mantis Claw" | "Isma's Tear" | ("Monarch Wings" + HARD + CLASSIC))

entry.name: Spore Shroom
entry.requirements: ("Mantis Claw" + ("Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak" | "Monarch Wings" | "Crystal Heart" | "Isma's Tear")) | ("Monarch Wings" + ("Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak" | "Isma's Tear") + HARD + CLASSIC)

entry.name: Longnail
entry.requirements: "Mantis Claw" | "Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak" | "Monarch Wings" | "Crystal Heart" | (("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul") + HARD) | (HARD + CLASSIC)

entry.name: Shaman Stone
entry.requirements: "Mantis Claw" | "Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak" | "Monarch Wings" | "Crystal Heart" | (("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul") + HARD) | (HARD + CLASSIC)

entry.name: Soul Eater
entry.requirements: ("Desolate Dive" | "Descending Dark") + ("Mantis Claw" | "Monarch Wings")

entry.name: Glowing Womb
entry.requirements: "Crystal Heart" + ("Mantis Claw" | "Monarch Wings")

entry.name: Fragile Heart
entry.requirements: "Mantis Claw" | "Mothwing Cloak" | "Monarch Wings" | "Shade Cloak" | "Isma's Tear" | (("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul") + HARD) | ("Crystal Heart" + ("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul" | "Grubberfly's Elegy" | "Glowing Womb" | "Spore Shroom" | "Desolate Dive" | "Descending Dark" | "Weaversong" | ("Mark of Pride" + HARD)))

entry.name: Fragile Greed
entry.requirements: "Mantis Claw" | "Mothwing Cloak" | "Monarch Wings" | "Shade Cloak" | "Isma's Tear" | (("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul") + HARD) | ("Crystal Heart" + ("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul" | "Grubberfly's Elegy" | "Glowing Womb" | "Spore Shroom" | "Desolate Dive" | "Descending Dark" | "Weaversong" | ("Mark of Pride" + HARD)))

entry.name: Fragile Strength
entry.requirements: "Mantis Claw" | "Mothwing Cloak" | "Monarch Wings" | "Shade Cloak" | "Isma's Tear" | (("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul") + HARD) | ("Crystal Heart" + ("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul" | "Grubberfly's Elegy" | "Glowing Womb" | "Spore Shroom" | "Desolate Dive" | "Descending Dark" | "Weaversong" | ("Mark of Pride" + HARD)))

entry.name: Joni's Blessing
entry.requirements: "Mantis Claw"

entry.name: Shape of Unn
entry.requirements: "Isma's Tear" + ("Monarch Wings" | "Mantis Claw")

entry.name: Hiveblood
entry.requirements: ("Mantis Claw" + ("Monarch Wings" | HARD)) | ("Monarch Wings" + ("Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak") + HARD)

entry.name: Dream Wielder
entry.requirements: KEYITEMS

entry.name: Dashmaster
entry.requirements: "Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak" | "Monarch Wings" | "Mantis Claw" | "Isma's Tear" | (("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul") + HARD) | ("Crystal Heart" + ("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul" | "Grubberfly's Elegy" | "Glowing Womb" | "Spore Shroom" | "Desolate Dive" | "Descending Dark" | "Weaversong"))

entry.name: Quick Slash
entry.requirements: ("Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak") + ("Desolate Dive" | "Descending Dark") + ("Mantis Claw" | ("Monarch Wings" + HARD))

entry.name: Spell Twister
entry.requirements: (("Mantis Claw" | "Monarch Wings") + HARD + CLASSIC) | ("Mantis Claw" + ("Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak" | "Crystal Heart" | "Monarch Wings" | "Isma's Tear"))

entry.name: Deep Focus
entry.requirements: ("Crystal Heart" + ("Mantis Claw" | ("Monarch Wings" + ("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul") + HARD))) | ("Monarch Wings" + ("Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak") + HARD)

entry.name: Grubberfly's Elegy
entry.requirements: KEYITEMS

entry.name: Sprintmaster
entry.requirements: "Mantis Claw" | ("Monarch Wings" + ("Vengeful Spirit" | "Shade Soul" | "Mothwing Cloak" | "Shade Cloak") + HARD)

entry.name: Dreamshield
entry.requirements: "Mantis Claw" | HARD

entry.name: Weaversong
entry.requirements: "Mantis Claw"

entry.name: Grimmchild
entry.requirements: "Mantis Claw" + ("Dream Nail" | "Dream Gate" | "Awoken Dream Nail")
